note.p: Death: St James's Fields, Pall Mall, Westminster, London, England, Europe (18 August 1662)
Career: Gentleman of the Privy Purse to the Duke of York

Notes: Date given as election date is date of proposal. NB: Foster has a Giles Rawlins who was educated at Brasenose College, Oxford; BA (1622), MA (1625) and became Rector of Ganarew (1624); Vicar of Wolferlow, Herefordshire (1625); Rector of Highley, Shropshire (1635)
